title._content: [Brigadier General William Polk Hardeman, Confederate States Army]

description._content: Title: [Brigadier General William Polk Hardeman, Confederate States Army] Creator: Unknown Date: ca. 1846-1847 Part Of: Lawrence T. Jones III Texas photography collection Description: Brigadier General William Polk Hardeman (1816-1898) in 1st Lieutenant uniform, was a soldier in the Texas Revolution, in the Mexican War, a Texas Ranger and Confederate general. The case and brass mat help date the image to the Mexican War era. Physical Description: 1 photograph: sixth plate daguerreotype; 7 x 8.3 x cm. Form/Genre: Daguerreotypes; Photographs; Portrait photographs File: ag2008_0005_00022_hardeman_opt.tif Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/jtx,436 View Lawrence T. Jones III Texas Photographs at: digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/jtx/
